name: A Crime in Time
description:
This game follows a character as she attempts to stop an evil teacher from messing with time. Travel to the future and the past to fix what she is breaking.

Controls: 

(puzzle)

- Arrow keys to walk

- Mouse to press buttons

- Click on character to start dialogue

(Mini Games)

- Arrows to move

- Space to Attack

-Shift to sprint

- to jump

Diversifiers: 

- Spooky Season

- Rhyme or Reason

- Henry F. Hall

- Jack of all Trades

Team Name: Twin Tacos

Members: Sonya (Sonya#8351), Melisa (Melisa#5118), Alp (Tacocat007), Zaid (ZBrave#5303), Vi (VV#4899)

Original Assets

Music by Eric Matyas
